title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
description: When changing the text in StyledText with word wrap enabled, there is an inefficient redraw occurring.
OB: During text change with word wrap enabled, the text in StyledText is not being redrawn efficiently.
EB: During text change with word wrap enabled, the text in StyledText should be redrawn efficiently.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, perform the following steps:
1. Enable word wrap in StyledText.
2. Make a text change in StyledText.
3. Observe the inefficient redraws occurring.

Additionally, to see the redraws occurring more clearly, add the following line to the performPaint method in StyledText class:
System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight);
